description: POST /projects endpoint for creating projects via REST API
Repeating tasks now correctly appear in upcoming/someday views
Default HTTP server port changed to 8484
REST API server with `thingies serve` command
View endpoints: GET /today, /inbox, /upcoming, /someday, /anytime, /logbook, /deadlines
Task CRUD endpoints: GET/POST/PATCH/DELETE /tasks and action endpoints (complete, cancel, move-to-today)
Project read endpoints: GET /projects, GET /projects/{uuid}
Heading write endpoints for project sections
Area and tag read endpoints: GET /areas, GET /tags
Snapshot endpoint: GET /snapshot for full Things state
Checklist item support in task queries
Name/UUID resolution utilities for projects and areas
AppleScript functions for task move and heading operations
CancelProject AppleScript function
`anytime` command showing tasks with start=1
`logbook` command for viewing completed tasks with completion dates
Project/heading UUIDs shown in task details view
Create/update/delete commands for areas and tags
`upcoming` and `someday` view commands
Heading support in task hierarchy display
Route registration for all endpoints after merge conflicts
Duplicate writeJSON/writeError methods in headings.go
Anytime view now includes scheduled someday tasks that are available
Tasks from trashed projects are now properly filtered out
Snapshot now includes IDs, upcoming/someday sections, and 'all' alias
Inbox query now uses start=0 matching Things behavior
Short UUIDs now supported in `tasks show`
Task list now shows only due dates, scheduled dates removed
Deadlines prefixed with 'due' in task output
Binary-packed date decoding in scanner.go
Task update --when now uses move to list correctly
Today query output format and added IDs
Go CLI rewrite with SQLite reads, URL scheme creates, AppleScript updates
Initial project structure and configuration
Tasks from trashed projects excluded from views
